FuncDef:
The alarm ipv6 nd attack disable command disables the alarm function for ND VLAN CAR.
The undo alarm ipv6 nd attack disable command enables the alarm function for ND VLAN CAR.
By default, the alarm function is enabled for ND VLAN CAR.
CLIs: alarm ipv6 nd { na | ns-multicast | ns-unicast } attack disable
undo alarm ipv6 nd { na | ns-multicast | ns-unicast } attack disable
Examples: [*HUAWEI-slot-1] alarm ipv6 nd na attack disable
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To disable the alarm function for ND VLAN CAR, run the alarm ipv6 nd attack disable command. To enable the alarm function for ND VLAN CAR, run the undo alarm ipv6 nd attack disable command.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
